activities: Bullhorn is a Software as a Service application that provides applicant tracking and messaging for staffing and recruiting professionals. Bullhorn allows its users to enter and manage the personal information of their respective clients into the system. In this capacity, Bullhorn is the data processor and does not determine the control or scope of the data that is entered.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
